title: Kekkaishi, Vol. 35
description: Who among our friends and enemies will sacrifice themselves—or others—to save the world from annihilation? What will be the ultimate fate of the child Chushinmaru, a “spirit reservoir” trapped alone for 400 years in the mystical site of Karasumori? And what is the final destiny of Karasumori’s faithful guardians, Yoshimori and Tokine...?!
author: Yellow Tanabe
